text: The Colombia women's under 17 national team represents Colombia in youth internationals. They have attended tournaments such as FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup and the South American Under-17 Women's Football Championship. In 2022 they finished runners-up at the 2022 FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup in India. ==Competitive record== *Draws include knockout matches decided on penalty kicks. **Gold background colour indicates that the tournament was won. ***Red border colour indicates tournament was held on home soil.
